articles.author: Juliette Arcodia, Patrick Smith
articles.title: U.S. tourist facing jail in Turks and Caicos for possessing ammunition is released - NBC News
articles.description: An American man who was facing up to 12 years in jail on this Caribbean island for bringing 20 rounds of ammunition on a vacation has been freed after a court ruling Friday.
articles.content: PROVIDENCIALES, Turks and Caicos  An American man who was facing up to 12 years in jail on this Caribbean island for bringing 20 rounds of ammunition on a vacation has been freed after a court ruling… [+3557 chars]
